column3: Use WASD to move and mouse to look.$Hold the left mouse button to plant in fertile soil.
Look at the door and left click to sleep.
Press Q/E to switch seeds.$Plants need to be supported by plants of lower complexity, or they will wither and die.
Trees require many plants to be supported.$Otherwise they will wither and die.
Each tree greatly enriches the soil around it, giving you more space to grow.
Right click to delete a plant.
